first.content: sdfg.| This dialogue has a [b]question[/b]. Use the [b]'up'[/b] and [b]'down'[/b] arrow keys to select a choice and then press the Continue button.

repeat.name: HM
repeat.content: Hey.| Hope you payed attention on the first time.| I'm [b]not[/b] going to repeat.

chose_option_3.text: Too bored to write a third sentence.
